channel.title: Week III on Xtern Bootcamp 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Week III on Xtern Bootcamp 2018

item.title: Day 9: Routing and Fetching
item.description: Monday, June 18, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 9, Part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 9, Part 1 Topics Routing React Router <Router /> Links and NavLinks Routes history Fetching Data The Fetch API Promises Parsing the response Deployment Firebase Examples Routing React Router provides a routing solution that allows us to change what UI we render based on the current URL.
